degatorli conciliabuli ephesini 3 act ca 10 append disclaime heresie yet hee never received communion many like intolerable calumny slander usuall livery ibas rest conventicle time disunion bestowed hee condemned cyrill memnon well nestorius law though acknowledged also baronius 449 n 130 true extant theodosian code doth accord expressed would man thinke ridiculous hence conclude cardinall doth certainly therefore forgery act chalcedon containing forgery held credit thus cardinall labour discredit act foully disgraceth himselfe men may justly doubt whether hee owne man writ thing voide truth binius expound baronius necatur totilas anno undecimo regnisui inchoato decimo expleto bar 553 nu 16 doth prophesie meant totilas slaine anno decimo tenth yeare complete plainly contradicteth prophesie tenth yeare wholly ended slaine tenth onely eleventh yeare tenth otherwise first second sixt yeare nay slaine yeare hee borne slaine yeares ended fully completed 24 binius se rom pontifici obsequentem praebet • loc citat et indem bar 553 nu 16 interlaceth emperours obsequent obedient pope baronius dum sibi imperari à rom pontifice passus • est bar ibid nu 17 expresseth ruled pope command flourish vanity arrogancy passe act iustinian fift councell doe demonstrate iustinian ought commander pope pope empire yet cradle added narses overcame gothes intercession blessed virgin desirous little large examine rather bar 553 nu 15 baronius little lesse triumpheth therein narses saith indevored thing mariae virginis ope help virgin mary cited certain word evagrius prove saith ibid nu 18 understand cujus niti praesidio duce debeant whose help general captain must rely may perform every difficultest enterprise truely even helpe mary mother god invocated prayer may rise enemy
